english: The severe form of the syndrome may include the most extreme forms of self-injurious, repetitive, highly unusual and aggressive behaviours .
chinese: 孤独症综合症的严重表现形成包括极端形式的自残行为，反复的离奇与攻击性行为。

english: It is illegal to maim oneself to escape duty
chinese: 为逃避责任而自残是违法的。

english: But why would i do something like that to myself
chinese: 但是我为什么要自残呢？

english: Self - mutilating de - virginizer , eviscerated in the chapel
chinese: 喜欢自残的花花公子在礼拜堂被开膛破肚

english: Is she any kind of threat to herseif

chinese: 自残造句挺难的，這是一个万能造句的方法

english: Do you intentionally injure yourself , for instance by cutting yourself or taking too many pills
chinese: 你会自残吗?譬如拿刀割自己或服用大量药物

english: Suicidal behaviour is complex . it occurs when someone deliberately inflicts physical harm on himself
chinese: 自杀是一种复杂的行为，一般是指某人蓄意自残身体。

english: The customs of self - deforming ornaments in ancient china reveal the pluralistic quality of the spiritual pursuits of ancient people
chinese: 从中国古代自残装饰习俗的表象，可以探寻出古人精神追求的多元性。

english: Depression can cause long periods of sadness and hopelessness , feelings of low self - worth , even physical pain . it is the leading cause of suicide
chinese: 抑郁能引起长期的悲伤和绝望,自我贬低甚至是自残,这都是引起自杀的原因

english: Obviously this tendency can get you into trouble , which is why add is high among criminals and self - destructive risk - takers
chinese: 很明显的是，这种倾向会给你带来麻烦，这也是add人群在罪犯和有自残倾向的人中占有较高比例的原因。

english: Smoking is a form of self - battering that also batters those who must sit by , occasionally joke or complain , and helplessly watch
chinese: 吸烟不仅是自残，而且对那些坐在旁边的也有害处，尽管这些人偶尔开个玩笑，抱怨一下，但最终还是无可奈何

english: Can you tell me why approval is needed before a post can appear here ? this kind of censorship is tantamount to self - castration for an already neglected forum
chinese: 请解释为什么要审核后才能发帖？本来坛子人气就不旺，再来一下审核，这不是自残吗？

english: The major causes of adolescent mortality and morbidity are not diseases , but preventable health risk behaviors such as intentional injuries , suicidal ideation or attempt
chinese: 可预防之高危因素（如自残、企图自杀等）是构成青少年死亡及发病之主要成因。

english: He is one of five french soldiers believed to have been court - martialed under mysterious circumstances and pushed out of an allied trench into an almost - certain death in no - man s land
chinese: 据一名前军官的可靠线布供称，马力治因自残身体而被判罪，联同其他四个士兵死于一个无人的战壕区。

english: The various customs of self - deforming ornaments such as foot - binding , tooth - digging , flesh - perforating and skin - pricking result from a good many factors in special social circumstances
chinese: 摘要缠足、凿齿、肉体上穿孔、皮肤上扎针等多种形式的自残装饰习俗，是特定社会环境中诸多因素的产物。
